statements: DELETE FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE age < 30 AND policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
DELETE FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE customer_id = 100 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM customer_behavior_data WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01' AND policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE purchase_amount < 100 AND purchase_date <= '2022-01-31';
DELETE FROM policies WHERE policy_name = 'Life Insurance';
DELETE FROM CustomerSegments WHERE segment_name = 'High Value Customers';
DELETE FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Email' AND campaign_end_date < '2022-06-30';
